H0.text: Cool and dry are the characteristics of maritime polar air masses.

H1.text: Warm and dry are the characteristics of maritime polar air masses.

H2.text: Cool and humid are the characteristics of maritime polar air masses.

H3.text: Warm and humid are the characteristics of maritime polar air masses.

A4.text: Polar air over the ocean (maritime) loses its stability as it gains moisture over warmer ocean waters.
